strings.string: This format defines the layout for the initial funnelback search page
This format defines the layout for the funnelback search results
This format defines the layout for the page returned when no results are found
This is the default format for all results in the list if they do not have a customised format
This format defines how the featured results are to be displayed.
This is the layout of how the contextual navigation results looks.
This is the layout of how each contextual navigation element looks.
This is the layout of how the contextual navigation looks.
This is the layout of how the spelling suggestion looks.
This is the customised layout for the %s type formats.
Enter a file type (eg. pdf, html, doc) to use the customised format for that file type. File types can be exposed by result_type keyword

Integrated Search uses the Funnelback OEM version installed into Matrix. Funnelback Server Search can be configured to access a Funnelback Server by adding in the URL of the server. Collections will be displayed based on the type of search eg. an funnelback server search will allow you to type the collections in, while the integrated search will display the collections defined in Funnelback Manager.
You cannot delete the link between the contextual navigation formats folder and the %s
You cannot delete the link between the spelling formats folder and the %s
You cannot delete the link between the %1s bodycopy and the %2s
